column4: I had problems with my nvidia drivers and went to version 173 using "Additional drivers" window. Now I think X won't start back up again. How do I revert?
where you using current before?  perhaps "sudo apt-get install nvidia-current" from a CLI?
I'll try that. I had forgotten I kind of "removed" the 'current' drivers.
are you still trying to use xchat-gnome?  if so, try the real xchat
